column4: I am Added entire repo copied from my friend's server to my machine. But Ubuntu 12.04 always seek the main server for installing packages instead of local folder of repo. How can i fix this?
I am Added entire repo copied from my friend's server to my machine. But Ubuntu 12.04 always seek the main server for installing packages instead of local folder of repo. How can i fix this?
: when offline synaptic tooks packages from local file. Is it required to change the file /etc/apt/sources.list
